# Tackling mass transit in low density areas {#slug-two}

#### Keywords {-}

yaba, daba, do

## 

Mass transit means less GHGs; also increases access and ease of movement for low-income populations; obviously most mass transit is concentrated in urban areas ... increasingly, areas around mass transit are becomeing too expensive for many populations, pushing those who rely on mass transit most out to underserved areas ... additionally, many smaller cities don't meet threshold for wide-ranging mass transit
